generated.css: @import url("https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Nunito+Sans:ital,wght@1,200&display=swap");*{padding:0;margin:0;box-sizing:border-box;font-family:Nunito Sans,sans-serif}.navbar{position:fixed;left:0;right:0;width:100%;z-index:10;height:.3rem}.navbar .menu{max-width:80rem;width:100%;margin:0 auto;padding:0 3rem;display:flex;justify-content:space-between;align-items:center;color:#fff}.navbar .menu .logo{font-size:2rem;font-weight:1000;text-transform:uppercase;letter-spacing:2px;line-height:5rem;color:#fff}.navbar .menu .logo span{font-size:2rem;font-weight:700;font-family:inherit}.navbar .burger{height:5rem;width:3rem;cursor:pointer;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:flex-end;z-index:10}.navbar .burger .bar{width:2rem;height:2px;border-radius:2px;background-color:#f0f8ff;transition:.3s;position:relative}.navbar .burger .bar:after,.navbar .burger .bar:before{content:"";position:absolute;width:inherit;height:inherit;background-color:#fff;transition:.5s}.navbar .burger .bar:after{transform:translateY(9px)}.navbar .burger .bar:before{transform:translateY(-9px)}.logoEnd{font-size:.8rem;padding-top:5px;font-weight:1000;transform:translateX(-298px);text-transform:none;letter-spacing:1px;line-height:5rem;color:#fff;display:block;position:relative;z-index:10;top:687px}.container{min-height:100vh;background-color:#5f9ea0;background-image:linear-gradient(100deg,#fff,#000)}.container,.container .main{width:100%;overflow:hidden;transform-style:preserve-3d}.container .main{position:relative;left:0;z-index:5;transform-origin:left;transition:.5s}.container .main header{min-height:100vh;width:100%;position:relative;opacity:1%}.container .main header.header_one{background:url(/8b3f82b63a563c34c23e3a63167e647e.jpg) no-repeat top/cover}.container .main header.header_two{background:url(/2932d7998ea032fea0c1ecf7ac4e6b52.jpg) no-repeat 50%/cover}.container .main header.header_three{background:url(/5e68ca8b4c01bb3874fd09e6c9d58fec.jpg) no-repeat 50%/cover}.container .main header.header_four{background:url(/62b2b3db6976bc4442d21dd15755dd3d.jpg) no-repeat bottom/cover}.container .main header.header_five{background:url(/5ead43e6c96fea4d4475b9de4dc74cd1.jpg) no-repeat}.container .main header .header{position:absolute;width:100%;top:0;height:100%;left:0;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.container .main header .header_item{max-width:35rem;text-align:center;color:#fff;padding:0 2rem}.container .main header .header_item .title{font-size:2rem}.container .main header .header_item .btn{z-index:10;margin-top:1rem;padding:.4rem 1.2rem;font-size:1rem;font-weight:700;text-transform:uppercase}.shadow{position:absolute;width:100%;height:100vh;top:0;left:0;transform-style:preserve-3d;transform-origin:left;transition:.5s;background:#000}.shadow.one{z-index:-1;opacity:.15}.shadow.two{z-index:-2;opacity:.1}.links{position:absolute;width:30%;right:0;top:0;height:100vh;z-index:2;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.links a{text-decoration:none;color:beige;padding:.4rem 0;font-size:1.4rem;display:inline-block;text-transform:capitalize;letter-spacing:0;transition:.3s;opacity:0;transform:translateY(10px);animation:hide .5s ease forwards}.links ul{list-style:none}.position2{opacity:1;transform:translateY(-125px);z-index:-2}.box2{position:fixed;margin:0 auto;height:5.5rem;transform:translateY(-85px);opacity:.2}.box2,.box3{background:#000;left:0;right:0;width:100%}.box3{position:relative;height:45px;opacity:.8;transform:translateY(498px);z-index:-2}.box3:hover{opacity:.4;transition:5s}.computer{max-width:60px;transform:translateX(-650px) translateY(-242px);width:100%;margin:0 auto;height:60px;display:flex;cursor:none}.inst{transform:translateY(687px) translateX(-25px);display:block}.facebook,.inst{max-width:24px;width:100%;margin:10px auto;height:24px;cursor:pointer}.facebook{transform:translateY(687px) translateX(-232px);display:flex;z-index:1}.mail{transform:translateY(687px) translateX(-163px);z-index:1000000}.mail,.telegram{max-width:24px;width:100%;margin:10px auto;height:24px;display:flex;cursor:pointer}.telegram{transform:translateY(687px) translateX(-95px);opacity:1}.btn1{text-align:center;position:fixed;right:260px;top:45px;height:10px;width:40px;transition:1s;cursor:pointer;box-shadow:2.5px 2.5px 2.5px rgba(0,0,0,.5);z-index:100}.btn1:hover{box-shadow:0 0 0 rgba(1,1,1,.2)}.popup{position:fixed;width:100%;height:100%;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.9);top:0;left:0;opacity:0;visibility:hidden;transition:all .8s ease 0s}.popup.open{opacity:1;visibility:visible}.popup.open .popup_content{transform:perspective(600px) translate(0) rotateX(0deg)}.popup_body{min-height:100%;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;padding:30px 20px}.popup_content{opacity:.8;background-color:#eee;color:#000;max-width:500px;padding:10px}.popup_close{position:absolute;right:10px;top:10px;font-size:29px}.popup_title{text-align:center;justify-content:center;font-size:30px}.popup_area{position:absolute}.popup2,.popup_area{width:100%;height:100%;top:0;left:0}.popup2{position:fixed;background-color:rgba(0,0,0,.9);opacity:0;visibility:hidden;transition:all .8s ease 0s}.popup2.open2{opacity:1;visibility:visible}.popup2.open2 .popup_content2{transform:perspective(600px) translate(0) rotateX(0deg)}.popup_body2{min-height:100%;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:center;padding:30px 20px}.popup_content2{background-color:#2f4f4f;color:#000;max-width:800px;padding:10px;opacity:.9;border-radius:20px}.popup_close2{position:absolute;right:10px;top:10px;font-size:29px}.popup_title2{margin:0;min-height:400px;max-height:600px;display:flex;justify-content:center;align-items:center}.calc{width:300px;border:#000;border-radius:10px;background-color:#a9a9a9;padding:10px;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(4,1fr);grid-auto-rows:40px;gap:10px}.calc_result{grid-column:1/-1;background:#000;color:#fff;font-size:30px;padding:5px;border-radius:10px}.calc_btn{border:none;cursor:pointer;box-shadow:3px 3px 3px rgba(0,0,0,.5);border-radius:10px;font-size:1.3rem}.calc_btn:hover{transform:rotateX(20deg);opacity:.8}.calc_btn:active{box-shadow:1px 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}.calc_btn_operator{background-color:#2f4f4f;border-radius:10px}.calc_btn_reset{background-color:#6495ed;border-radius:10px}.calc_btn_equal{background-color:#4682b4;border-radius:10px}.popup_area2{position:absolute;width:100%;height:100%;top:0;left:0}.popupButton.popup-link2{position:fixed;right:360px;top:45px;height:10px;width:40px;transition:1s;cursor:pointer;box-shadow:2.5px 2.5px 2.5px rgba(0,0,0,.5)}.popupButton.popup-link2:hover{box-shadow:0 0 0 rgba(1,1,1,.2)}.btn2{position:absolute;right:340px;top:30px;height:20px;width:50px;color:#000;opacity:0}.app{padding-top:5rem;display:flex;justify-content:center}.wrap{width:500px}.select{transform:translateY(-15px);width:100%;position:relative;z-index:100;color:#fff;background-color:#000;opacity:.5}.select.open .select__dropdown{display:block;background-color:#000;opacity:1;color:#fff}.select.open .select__input{border-bottom:none;color:#fff}.select.open .select__backdrop{display:block}.select__input{height:46px;display:flex;align-items:center;justify-content:space-between;padding:0 1rem;cursor:pointer}.select__dropdown,.select__input{border:1px solid #ccc;border-radius:5px}.select__dropdown{display:none;position:absolute;top:46px;left:0;right:0;max-height:200px;overflow-y:auto;box-shadow:2px 3px 5px rgba(0,0,0,.3)}.select__list{padding:0;margin:0;list-style:none}.select__backdrop{position:fixed;display:none;z-index:100;width:100%;height:100%;top:0;right:0;left:0;bottom:0;background:transparent}.select__item{padding:1rem;border-bottom:1px solid #ccc}.select__item.selected{background-color:#008b8b}.select__item:hover{background-color:#2f4f4f;cursor:pointer;transition:background-color .15s ease-in}.container.active .bar{transform:rotate(1turn);background-color:transparent}.container.active .bar:before{transform:translateY(0) rotate(50deg)}.container.active .bar:after{transform:translateY(0) rotate(-50deg)}.container.active .main{animation:main-animation 1s ease;cursor:pointer;transform:rotateY(20deg) translateZ(300px) scale(.5)}.container.active .main:hover{transform:rotateY(20deg) translateZ(340px) scale(.5)}.container.active .main:hover+.shadow.one{transform:rotateY(40deg) translateZ(230px) scale(.5)}.container.active .links a{animation:appear .5s forwards ease var(--i)}@keyframes main-animation{0%{transform:translate(0)}to{transform:rotateY(20deg) translateZ(310px) scale(.5)}}@keyframes hide{0%{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}to{opacity:0;transform:translateY(10px)}}@keyframes appear{0%{opacity:0;transform:translateY(10px)}to{opacity:1;transform:translateY(0)}}
